thread.title: 'Wacky' weather makes Arctic warmer than parts of Europe

title: 'Wacky' weather makes Arctic warmer than parts of Europe
text:
'Wacky' weather makes Arctic warmer than parts of Europe Tuesday, February 27, 2018 - 01:59 
A freak warming around the North Pole is sending a blast of Arctic cold over Europe in a sign of “wacky” weather that may happen more often with man-made global warming, say scientists.   
A freak warming around the North Pole is sending a blast of Arctic cold over Europe in a sign of “wacky” weather that may happen more often with man-made global warming, say scientists.  //reut.rs/2CM5y8M
